name: Dagath
description: Never underestimate the power and wrath of sullen sadness. Dagath's malice deals high damage.

abilities.name: Wyrd Scythes
abilities.description: Wyrd Scythes surround Dagath and seek out nearby enemies. Those struck are slowed and suffer <DT_VIRAL_COLOR>Viral Damage with a guaranteed Status Effect. The scythes also spread Doom and extend its duration.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Condemn nearby enemies to their doom. A portion of the damage Dagath deals is revisited upon them by a Wyrd Scythe. They also suffer <DT_VIRAL_COLOR>Viral Damage.

abilities.name: Grave Spirit
abilities.description: Supercharge Dagath’s weapons with extra Critical Damage. The effects are doubled on Doomed enemies. Escape fatal blows by briefly assuming a spectral form.

abilities.name: Rakhali’S Cavalry
abilities.description: Phantom Kaithes charge forth, inflicting <DT_VIRAL_COLOR>Viral Damage upon all in their path. Their attack strips the defenses of Doomed enemies.

languages.description: Unterschätze nie die Macht und den Zorn mürrischer Trauer. Dagaths Bosheit verursacht hohen Schaden.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Ne sous-estimez jamais le pouvoir et la colère d’une tristesse maussade. La malveillance de Dagath inflige des dégâts importants.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Non sottovalutare mai il potere e l'ira della tristezza taciturna. La malvagità di Dagath infligge danni elevati.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: 음울한 슬픔이 뿜어내는 힘과 분노를 결코 얕보지 마세요. 다가스는 그 악의로 하여금 높은 피해를 입힙니다.
languages.name: 다가스

languages.description: Nunca subestimes el poder y la ira de la tristeza taciturna. La malicia de Dagath causa un daño significativo.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: 永远不要低估忧怨带来的力量和怒火。Dagath 的怨恨会造成很高的伤害。
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Никогда не стоит недооценивать гневную силу угрюмой печали. Злоба Дагаc наносит большой урон.
languages.name: Дагас

languages.description: 陰気なる悲哀の力と怒りを侮るべからず。Dagathの悪意は大ダメージを与える。
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Nigdy nie lekceważ potęgi gniewu powstałego w bezdennej rozpaczy. Złość Dagath zadaje wysokie obrażenia.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Jamais subestime o poder e a fúria de uma melancolia soturna. A perversidade da Dagath causa dano elevado.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: 永遠不要低估陰鬱悲傷的力量和狂怒。Dagath 的怨恨可以造成很高的傷害。
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: อย่าประมาทพลังและความโกรธที่เกิดจากความเศร้าโศกจนสุมเป็นความแค้น เพราะความอาฆาตของ Dagath สร้างความเสียหายได้สูงมาก
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Kasvetli üzüntünün gücünü ve gazabını asla küçümseme. Dagath'ın kötülüğü yüksek hasar verir.
languages.name: Dagath

languages.description: Не варто недооцінювати силу та лють гіркого смутку. Злоба Даґат завдає великої шкоди.
languages.name: Даґат
